title: Leave the Information Gathering to Me!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Haaah~, a school idol’s live is the best after all, huh. It’s also good for your health!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah, they were so cute~. I’m glad I came<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Be grateful to Nico, who was the first to get hold of the live’s information!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I’m truly grateful! Ah, hey, hey, Nico-chan, I found another school idol that caught my interest.... Do you know these girls?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh....? Y-, yeah, I know. Obviously!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I knew you would know them, Nico-chan. They uploaded a new video, would you watch it with me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Sure. Alright, let’s buy some juice and go to the park<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Then, I would like to drink hot chocolate!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hot chocolate.... Then there’s a coffee shop inside the park that has it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>As expected of Nico-chan, your ability to gather information is amazing! Let’s get going!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
